title: Creative financing. Contract for Deed. Lease Options. Rent to Own.
posting_body: ['Are you interested in buying a home but do not have the credit to get a loan direct from a bank?', 'We specialize in creative financing for people that want to buy a home with bad credit.', 'I know that it can be frustrating.', 'If you have some cash to work with, we can help!', 'I am a licensed real estate agent/real estate investor with lots of experience helping people that want to buy a home, but may not know of some of the ways to get into a house without the conventional way of getting a loan through a bank.', 'We work with local real estate investors that will help you buy a home.', 'You make a down payment and monthly payments for a period of time, and then you have the legal right to buy that home direct from the investor when your credit gets better and qualify for your own loan.', 'We also have a great referral for a lender and credit repair specialist to work with that will help you buy the home.', 'Most realtors do not know how to do these kinds of real estate transactions, but we help people every day with finding the home of their dreams.', 'For more information, please take a look at my website:', '<URL>', 'Send me an email and let me know a little bit about your situation and what you are looking to do.', 'I can help.', 'My name is Steve Ersfeld and I work with Bridge Realty.', 'I am a licensed Realtor in the state of MN and WI.', 'Please send me an email with your phone number and email address, and I will respond as soon as possible, you can also call me at:', 'show contact info', '.', 'If your property is now listed with a REALTOR or Broker, please disregard this offer, as it is not our intention to solicit the offerings of other REALTORS or Brokers.']
